import{SET_DATE,SET_TIME,SET_LOCATION,RESET_FORM}from'./actions';const initialState={date:'',time:'',location:''};// Reducer Function
const formReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_DATE:return{...state,date:action.payload};case SET_TIME:return{...state,time:action.payload};case SET_LOCATION:return{...state,location:action.payload};case RESET_FORM:return initialState;default:return state;}};export default formReducer;
